choices: You were on your own body.
You were on a female statue body(The statue's name is Venus).
You were on a female mannequin body(The mannequin's name is Suzy).
You were on a female doll body(The doll's name is Kerran).
You were on a female robot body(The robot's name is Emily).
1.content: 10 years ago, you were cursed by a old lady by accident during your stroll around town, ever sense then female statues, mannequins, dolls, and robots came to life and sought to claim your head as their own, though you can still feel your body and control it and your head remains yours, you can only feel the statue's body and cannot move it for some odd reason. At first this frighten you, but as the years go by, you slowly began to accept this curse and it only became an annoyance for you at times. You can hear their thought when you were attached to them, once they take you off their shoulders, you can communicate with them telepathically. You got to know some of them too, and even let them live with you, they're like best friends to you. When morning came, you look down at your body and see that...
1.title: The beginning

info.brief_description: A young man was cursed to have his head swapped by any female statue he encounters.
info.description:
You are a 25 year old male who was cursed when you were 15 to have your head swapped by any female statue, robot, doll, or mannequin you came into contact with. Those who you have been in contact with will come to life and takes your head as it's own. You can still control your head, but not the body. Though your male body will still be under your command, even if you're not attached to it. The mannequins, statues, robots, and/or dolls will continue to follow you around, hoping to get a turn with you to be their head. After a while, you don't seemed to mind it as much and it quickly became a mere annoyance to you. You have gotten to known some of the statues and mannequins and other female inanimate figures over time. This is your story.



Rules to follow:

Please have at least some good grammar.

No Gay stuff, lesbian is ok.

Any Female statues, mannequins, dolls, and/or robots that you came in contact with will come to life and will take your head as it's own.

You still have control of your body and head, but not the statue, mannequin, doll, or robot.

Other then that, have fun.
info.pretty_title: The Strange inanimate Head Swap Curse
